column4: i need a CLI application that just gives me a list of upgradable packages, i dont want to upgrade or have a GUI
you can use aptitude in cli
i tried but theres no way to get just the list :S, i simulated the update and everything but i still need to give it input wheter i want to update or not, i just need a list of the packages
[18:36:46] <nickrud> IdleOne, run aptitude , then hit the [ to expand the Upgradeable Packages tree, it's hightlighted by default if there are any
